subject: Re: Another Hack
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
And with the built in cassette recorder, easily recorded!
 Frank-S






--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
<michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
>
> Well... after much probing, proding, and soldering... I have hacked 
> another AM/FM to do the ole' raw audio band sweep routine.  This 
was 
> one of those "Made in China" AM/FM/Cassette combos.
> Nothing like the clarity and smooth sweep operation of the Radio 
Shack 
> Hack models 12-470 (older version) & 12-469 (clicking model)... but 
it 
> provides those snippets and fragments some enjoy so much.
> 
> - Mike
>
